original_text:
Terror will seize them,
    pain and anguish will grip them;
    they will writhe like a woman in labor.
They will look aghast at each other,
    their faces aflame.
korean_text: 그들이 놀라며 괴로움과 슬픔에 사로잡혀 해산이 임박한 여자 같이 고통하며 서로 보고 놀라며 얼굴이 불꽃 같으리로다

sentences.original_text: pain and anguish will grip them
they will writhe like a woman in labor
They will look aghast at each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 서로 놀라 얼굴을 볼 것이며
